channel.title: Need explanation for Suites in webUI
channel.description:
Hi, I am exploring webUI concepts and searched for **Suites**. I didn't get any solution for what is suites and why it is used for, can anyone explain why suites is used for which is in web UI.
Thanks in advance

item.title: Need explanation for Suites in webUI
item.dc:creator: punkrokk
item.description:
Suites was a legacy EWC functionality that is no longer supported in the open source version.

Read full topic
item.source: Need explanation for Suites in webUI
